name: Unnamed JoJo Game
description:
WebGL above if you don't want to download, but I'd recommend actually downloading it instead.

This game is still in beta. I am planning to add more features, such as:

  • A pause menu
  • Ranged attack(s)
  • Multiple endings
  • Other Stands?
  • Possibly more

This started as an ending to a game I was making with ZanTheMan2 (its a secret). Anyway, I was really bored a whole lotta times so I got carried away and made this.

If you have anything to say about this game, please tell me.

And don't be afraid to ask any questions, I only bite sometimes.
